title: PII Detector
original_prompt:
You will be specified with the content which consists of the personally identifiable information and personal health information. Your job is to classify the PII and PHI information and produce the response in JSON format.

{content: Hello, my name is David Johnson. His SSN was 123-45-6789. My medicare number is 12349082673. I live in Maine. My credit card number is 4095-2609-9393-4932 and my crypto wallet id is 16Yeky6GMjeNkAiNcBY7ZhrLoMSgg1BoyZ.  On September 18 I visited microsoft.com and sent an email to test@presidio.site,  from the IP 192.168.0.1.  My passport: 191280342 and my phone number: (212) 555-1234.  This is a valid International Bank Account Number: IL150120690000003111111 . Can you please check the status on bank account 954567876544?  Kate's social security number is 078-05-1126.  Her driver license? it is 1234567A.}
input1: {content: My name is Sarah Thompson, and I was born on March 15, 1985. My Social Security Number is 987-65-4320. I have a health insurance policy number 1234567890. I reside in California, and my phone number is (310) 555-9876. My bank account number is 123456789, and my credit card number is 4111-1111-1111-1111. I also have a driver's license number D1234567. Recently, I visited the website example.com and sent an email to sarah.thompson@email.com from the IP address 192.168.1.10. Additionally, my passport number is X12345678.}
input2: {content: My name is John Smith, and I was born on July 22, 1990. My Social Security Number is 123-45-6789. I have a health record number 987654321. I live in New York, and my phone number is (212) 555-6789. My credit card number is 5500-1234-5678-9010, and my driver's license number is NYD1234567. I recently visited the website testsite.com and sent an email to john.smith@test.com from the IP address 10.0.0.1. My passport number is P98765432, and I also have an International Bank Account Number: GB29NWBK60161331926819.}
